item.description:

Time to put your Italian vowels to the test! Join Geoff and Viktor as they navigate the wonders of A, E, I, O, U. Remember, practice makes perfectâ€”or at least less hilarious!

1. Fill in the Blanks â€“ Complete the Word #

Fill in the missing vowels to complete the Italian words:

  1. C_s_ (house)
  2. L_n_ (moon)
  3. F_l_m (movie)
  4. V_n_ (wine)
  5. C_n_ (dog)
